alert.note: Alert for Bristol; Kent; Newport; Providence (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 29 at 8:44PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL BRISTOL...NORTHEASTERN NEWPORT...NORTHEASTERN KENT... SOUTHEASTERN PROVIDENCE AND BRISTOL COUNTIES... At 843 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Barrington, or near Warwick, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Providence, Fall River, Warwick, Cranston, East Providence, Bristol, Somerset, Portsmouth, Barrington, Swansea, Tiverton, Westport, Seekonk, Rehoboth, Warren, Freetown, Dighton and Berkley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
